title: Weighing the Cost of Brexit
description: Is it possible to calculate the cost of Brexit?  Gemma Tetlow from the Institute for Government helps us weigh the arguments. How much does luck play into Liverpool FC's amazing season? And, crucially, how fast is an alligator?
itunes:subtitle: The cost of Brexit, alligator speed and Liverpool FC's luck
itunes:summary: Is it possible to calculate the cost of Brexit?  Gemma Tetlow from the Institute for Government helps us weigh the arguments. How much does luck play into Liverpool FC's amazing season? And, crucially, how fast is an alligator?
itunes:author: BBC Radio 4
